name: Chistmas boss fight game - for Nt Game Jam
name_original: Chistmas boss fight game - for Nt Game Jam
description:
Step in to the shoes of a little elf trying to save christmas from the Grinches evil plans.

W,A,S,D to move in menu and game.

E to enter level. you have to beat the level before to advance

leftclick to shoot and space to jump.
